ModMetaData.name: GrimWorld 40,000 - Regiments of Renown
ModMetaData.author: Clashgore, Eridanus, Jerry The Cultist, BlackMarket420, Abomination, Shun The Witch, Sophia Orr
ModMetaData.description:
"For every one of us who falls, ten more will take his place!"

Regiments of Renown adds a wide array of distinct, Imperial regiments from Warhammer 40K. Featuring unique armor sets and equipment for each force, the mod allows for some degree of diversity and flexibility for thematic playstyles. While these items may lack in the diversity that each main entry on the mini-series, it provides a quick and compatible alternative. Some of the regiments present here may be expanded in to full blown releases.

This mod includes:
- Apparels
- Melee and ranged weapons

Regiments of Renown is a mod within the "Regiments of Renown" mini-series, from GrimWorld 40,000.
